inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: referral for EGD under general sedation
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: contraindication for upper endoscopy or video capsule ingestion
exclusion.label: not_met

notes: Patient has cirrhosis and was referred for EGD under general sedation. However, there is no clear indication that written informed consent was obtained.
